programs.program:
as principal admin password "admin" do
create principal bob "pswd"
set x = "999"
set delegation x admin write -> bob
return x
***

as principal bob password "pswd" do
set y = "bob was here"
set x = "here too"
return x
***

as principal bob password "pswd" do
delete delegation x bob write -> bob
return y
***

as principal bob password "pswd" do
return x
***
